product_name: 83 Sportswear Riding in Paris Bike Jersey - Women's
long_description: Show your love of old Paree in the women's 83 Sportswear Riding in Paris Bike Jersey. Lighweight polyester material is super efficient at wicking moisture; it also has an antimicrobial finish that resists odors. Club-cut jersey provides a close but not supertight fit. Full hidden front zipper makes for quick changes and easy ventilation control. Elastic at waist keeps jersey in place when in the riding position. Mesh side panels help keep you cool. 3 rear pockets keeps essentials handy.
short_description: Show your love of old Paree in the women's 83 Sportswear Riding in Paris Bike Jersey.
